meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

presenters: Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Glenn Ayars, Assistant Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Anna Hubbell Petang, Assistant Director, Office of Arts and Culture
Reginald Williams, Assistant Director, Convention and Event Services
Evalynn Williams, President, Dikita Enterprises Inc.

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 18, 2025, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Developing a Quality of Life Strategy - Dallas Cultural Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Dallas Cultural Plan and its implementation.

agenda_items.title: Kay Bailey Hutchison Convention Center Master Plan, Component 4: The Black Academy of Arts and Letters Temporary Location
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the temporary relocation of TBAAL during renovations.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item 25-910A - March 26, 2025, Council Meeting: Office of Arts and Culture: FY 2025-26 Community Artists Program Guidelines
agenda_items.description: Review of the guidelines for the Community Artists Program.

agenda_items.title: City Facilities Partners Update - Meyerson Symphony Center
agenda_items.description: Update on the management and operations of the Meyerson Symphony Center.

agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items and initiatives.
